actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to designate a segment of the Kings River in California as a wild and scenic river.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Kings River, California, as a wild and scenic river. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to designate a segment of the Kings River in California as a wild and scenic river.
